Class TEInventory

    • net.minecraft.tileentity.TileEntity

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.JasonILTG.ScienceMod.IScienceModContent, com.JasonILTG.ScienceMod.tileentity.general.ITileEntityScienceMod, net.minecraft.inventory.IInventory, net.minecraft.server.gui.IUpdatePlayerListBox, net.minecraft.world.IWorldNameable

    public abstract class TEInventory
extends com.JasonILTG.ScienceMod.tileentity.general.TEScience
implements net.minecraft.inventory.IInventory, net.minecraft.server.gui.IUpdatePlayerListBox
    Wrapper class for all tile entities with inventories.
    Author:
    JasonILTG and syy1125
